name: ocean cubes
description:
this game is in development, so you may run into some bugs.

ocean cubes is a classic short atmospheric puzzle game  with a small story , in ocean cubes you play with  small lovely cubes and in order to finish the level you need to make them work with each others.

_____________________________________________________

to get the best experience:

wear headphones

play with a joystick 

play with a friend

____________________________________________________

joystick controls;

left stick , left trigger - blue cube

right stick , right trigger - white cube

start button - start button

keyboard Controls:

WASD , Q - blue cube

IJKL , U - white cube

esc -  start button

Alt + Enter - Borderless fullscreen (for Desktop)

_________________________________________________
